00024 /*! \file FileHeader.h This file defines a class to act as a data container for the generic file header
00025  */

00041 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00042 {
00043 
00044 static const u_int8_t MAGIC_NUM = 59;
00045 static const u_int8_t CALVINIOVERSION = 1;
00046 
00047 /*! This class defines a data container for the generic file header */
00048 class FileHeader
00049 {
00050 public:
00051         
00052         FileHeader();
00053         ~FileHeader() { Clear(); }
00054 
00055 private:
00056 
00057         /*! filename */
00058         std::string filename;
00059         u_int8_t magic;
00060         u_int8_t version;
00061         DataGroupHdrVector dataGroupHdrs;
00062         GenericDataHeader genericHdr;
00063         /*! Number of data dataGroups in the file */
00064         int32_t numDataGroups;
00065         /*! Position of the first DataGroup. */
00066         u_int32_t firstDataGroupFilePos;
00067 
00068 public:
00069 
00070         void Clear();
00071         /*!  */
00072         void SetFilename(const std::string &p);
00073         /*!  */
00074         std::string GetFilename() const;
00075         u_int8_t GetMagicNumber() const;
00076         u_int8_t GetVersion() const;
00077         /*! Get the number of DataGroupHeaders added */
00078         int32_t GetDataGroupCnt() const;
00079         void AddDataGroupHdr(const DataGroupHeader &p);
00080         /*! Get a DataGroupHeader by index.  Max index < GetDataGroupCnt */
00081         DataGroupHeader& GetDataGroup(int32_t index);
00082         const DataGroupHeader& GetDataGroupConst(int32_t index) const;
00083         void GetDataGroupIts(DataGroupHdrIt &begin, DataGroupHdrIt &end);
00084         void SetGenericDataHdr(const GenericDataHeader &p);
00085         GenericDataHeader* GetGenericDataHdr();
00086         /*! Finds a DataGroupHeader by name.
00087          *      @param name The name of the DataGroup
00088          *  @return A pointer to the DataGroupHeader.  If not found, the return is 0.
00089          */
00090         DataGroupHeader* FindDataGroupHeader(const std::wstring& name);
00091         /*! Get the number of DataGroups in a file.*/
00092         int32_t GetNumDataGroups() const { return numDataGroups; }
00093         /*! Set the number of DataGroups.  Set when reading a file */
00094         void SetNumDataGroups(int32_t value) { numDataGroups = value; }
00095         /*! Get the file position to the first DataGroup */
00096         u_int32_t GetFirstDataGroupFilePos() { return firstDataGroupFilePos; }
00097         /*! Set the file postion to the first DataGroup. Method should be protected.  It is set when the object is being read. */
00098         void SetFirstDataGroupFilePos(u_int32_t value) { firstDataGroupFilePos = value; }
00099 };
